Title: Repeals certain provisions relating to securing compensation to employees; repealer
Summary: Relates to securing compensation to employees by insuring and keeping insured the payment of compensation with any stock corporation, mutual corporation or reciprocal insurer.
LawCode: Rpld §50 sub 2, rpld §54 sub 7, amd §§54, 94, 151 & 157, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to securing compensation to employees; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
